article_title: RCMP seek help to locate missing 14-year-old Moncton girl
article_description: Police are asking for the public s help to locate 14 year old Faith Rourke of Moncton
article_content: Codiac Regional RCMP are asking for the public s help to locate 14 year old Faith Rourke of Moncton Rourke was last seen March 10 at around 7 p m  on Mapleton Road She is five foot two and weighs about 150 pounds  She has blond hair and browns eyes Poli   216 chars
